ComicInfo.Series: Chaos Campus: Sorority Girls vs. Zombies
ComicInfo.Summary:
Smart Zombies, Part 2 of 2
Act 2 continues as our Chaos Trio deals with the presentation of Lucian, a scientist zombie who was able to retain his former intellect even after full infection. Could this be a step forward in human/zombie relations? Haha, you're funny! You know it's leading to action, violence, bloodshed, and the odds of an explosion or two are pretty high!
